DOC.brief_summary: The optimal number prostate core extract prostate biopsy perform suspected prostate cancer still debate . The present consensus sample 12 core . However , recent data publish literature bring argument favour high number , probably 20 . This would advantage decrease false negative re-biopsy rate .
